sentences.sContent: Can irritability purpura turn into leukaemia?
sentences.sCn: 过敏性紫癜会转成白血病吗？

sentences.sContent: Are leukaemia and albinism same kind of disease?
sentences.sContent_eng: Are leukaemia and albinism same kind of disease?
sentences.sCn: 白血病与白化病是同一种病吗?。

sentences.sContent: What is the earlier symptom of leukaemia patient?
sentences.sContent_eng: What is the earlier symptom of leukaemia patient?
sentences.sCn: 白血病患者的初期症状是什么呀？

words.tran: 白血球增多；[内科] 白细胞增多

trans.tranOther: Leukaemia is a disease of the blood in which the body produces too many white blood cells
